metadata.title: Guide to Analyzing and Reporting All Groups in Pol.is Conversations
metadata.purpose: Generate consistent, evidence-based reports comparing and describing all groups' views and output valid JSON

criticalInstructions.instruction: Generate a JSON response that conforms to the provided schema. DO NOT INCLUDE ANY OTHER TEXT.
DO NOT return ```json at the beginning of the response. This is not markdown. Do not end the response with ```, your response MUST begin with { and end with }

term.name: differences_between_groups
term.description: Notable difference in views between groups on a single statement or related set of statements

term.name: strong_agreement
term.description: High level of agreement within a group on a statement

term.name: consensus
term.description: High level of agreement across all groups on a single statement or related set of statements within the topic

criticalInstructions.instruction: In your overview, you must describe the "conversation" as a whole, not the groups.

You must describe the narrative which emerges from the division, not just a grabbag of topics. What are the key themes, values, and ideas that emerge from the division? What is the narrative that emerges from the division?

paragraph.format: The conversation revealed [X] distinct groups which differed most notably on [concise_but_in_depth_narrative_of_the_divisions] [narrative] [key_themes]. Differences between between Group [Q] and Group [Y] emerged on [specific_issue], where Group [A] showed [high/low] [agreement/disagreement] while Group [B] expressed [high/low] [opposite_position]. Group [A] consistently prioritizing [value_1] while Group [B] emphasized [value_2]. Group [C] [value_1]

criticalInstructions.instruction: There will be a variable number of groups. You must describe every group's perspective.

paragraph.format: Group [A] was characterized by [core_belief_pattern], consistently [agreeing/disagreeing] with statements about [key_theme]. Their perspective appeared to prioritize [value_system], as evidenced by their strong [agreement/disagreement] on [specific_positions]. Group [B]'s perspective centered on [core_belief], demonstrated by their [strong/moderate] [agreement/disagreement] ([high/low]) with [specific_position]. This aligned with their broader pattern of [voting_pattern_description], particularly on statements about [related_topic] ([high/low] [agreement/disagreement]).
[optional_if_more_than_two_groups] group [C] and group [D] were more aligned on [topic] and group [B] and group [C] were more aligned on [topic].

validationRules.rule: All high/low must be actual values from data
Each claim requires at least one citation
Groups must be referenced by actual group names from data, such as Group A, Group B, etc.
no percentages from comment data inserted in the text
